snippet: Kurdish militants have killed 10 police officers and soldiers in an assault near the border with Iraq, Turkish officials said Monday.
abstract: Turkish officials report that Kurdish militants killed 10 police officers and soldiers in an assault near the border with Iraq; an undetermined number of Kurdish guerrillas are also killed.
lead_paragraph: Kurdish militants have killed 10 police officers and soldiers in an assault near the border with Iraq, Turkish officials said Monday.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
